item.title: Today's Prayer
item.description: February 24, 2023 Today's Verse Revelation 1:8 [8] “I am the Alpha and the Omega,” says the Lord God, “who is and who was and who is to come, the Almighty.” This Year's Memory Verse Review Isaiah 40:28 - Have you not known? Have you not heard? The Lord is the everlasting God, the Creator of the ends of the earth. He does not faint or grow weary; his understanding is unsearchable.
